text:
Canda#H Suqkrasyaq pAtra#masi caqndramA# dEqvatA# saqtO bRu#hatIq CandO# maqnthinaqH pAtra#masiq viSvE#dEqvA dEqvatOqShNihAq Canda# AgrayaqNasyaq pAtra#maqsIndrO# dEqvatA# kaqkucCanda# uqkthAnAqM pAtra#masi pRuthiqvI dEqvatA# viqrAT CandO$ dhruqvasyaq pAtra#masi || 19
(aqntari#kShENa - bRuhaqtI - traya#stri(gm)Sacca) (A6)
